trans-unit.source: Represents padding or margin information associated with a user interface (UI) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações de preenchimento ou margem associadas a um elemento de IU (interface do usuário).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> structure represents the padding or margin associated with a rectangular UI element such as a control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> estrutura representa o preenchimento ou associado a um elemento de interface do usuário retangular como um controle de margem.

trans-unit.source: The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento é o espaço interno entre o corpo do elemento de interface do usuário e sua borda.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a margin is the distance separating the adjoining edges of two adjacent UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Em contraste, uma margem é a distância que separa as bordas adjacentes de dois elementos adjacentes de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Because of structural similarities, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> is used to represent both padding and margins.
trans-unit.target: Devido a semelhanças estruturais, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> é usada para representar o preenchimento e margens.

trans-unit.source: For a diagram that illustrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> properties on a control, see [Margin and Padding in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para um diagrama que ilustra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> propriedades em um controle, consulte [margem e preenchimento em controles dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md).

trans-unit.source: Padding has a different effect on controls that are containers than on controls that are not.
trans-unit.target: Preenchimento tem um efeito diferente em controles que são contêineres que em controles que não são.

trans-unit.source: For example, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> property defines the spacing between the border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> propriedade define o espaçamento entre a borda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> e seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> property defines the spacing between the border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control and its contained text.
trans-unit.target: Para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> propriedade define o espaçamento entre a borda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle e o texto contido.

trans-unit.source: In addition to typical methods and properties, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> also defines the following type-level members:
trans-unit.target: Além dos métodos comuns e propriedades, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> também define os seguintes membros do nível do tipo:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty> field, which represents a predefined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> with no padding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty> campo, que representa um predefinidos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> sem preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: A set of operators for performing common arithmetic operations for the class, such as adding two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objects together.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de operadores para executar operações aritméticas comuns para a classe, como a adição de dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objetos juntos.

trans-unit.source: For languages that do not support operator overloading, you can invoke these members by using alternative method syntax.
trans-unit.target: Para idiomas que não oferecem suporte a sobrecarga de operador, você pode invocar esses membros usando sintaxe de método alternativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> properties, which provide combined values that are convenient for use in custom layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> propriedades, que fornecem valores combinados são convenientes para uso em cálculos de layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the Padding property to create an outline around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar a propriedade de preenchimento para criar uma estrutura de tópicos ao redor de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Border Around a Windows Forms Control Using Padding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: criar uma borda em torno de Windows Forms controle usando preenchimento](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels to be used for padding for all edges.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels a ser usado para o preenchimento de todas as bordas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> class using the supplied padding size for all edges.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> usando o tamanho de preenchimento fornecido para todas as bordas.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> properties to the value of the `all` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedades para o valor da `all` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do preenchimento, em pixels, da borda esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do preenchimento, em pixels, da borda superior.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do preenchimento, em pixels, da borda direita.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do preenchimento, em pixels, da borda inferior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> class using a separate padding size for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> usando um tamanho de preenchimento separado para cada borda.

trans-unit.source: If all of the parameter values are equal, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property will reflect this common value.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os valores de parâmetro forem iguais, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedade refletirá esse valor comum.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: Computes the sum of the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a soma dos dois valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that contains the sum of the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que contém a soma dos dois valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for all the edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento de todas as bordas.

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for all edges if the same; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, de todas as bordas, se iguais; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: When retrieving this property, if all the edges use the same padding value, then this common value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade, se todas as bordas de usam o mesmo valor de preenchimento, esse valor comum é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, -1 is returned to indicate that all the padding values are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, -1 será retornado para indicar que todos os valores de preenchimento não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Definir esse valor é alterado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para a borda inferior.

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento em pixels, da borda inferior.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode alterar esse valor de configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> object with no padding.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> sem preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: An empty padding object is defined as having the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> padding properties set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto vazio de preenchimento é definido como tendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> propriedades de preenchimento definido como 0.

trans-unit.source: This immutable field is useful for comparison operations and initializations.
trans-unit.target: Este campo imutável é útil para operações de comparação e inicializações.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the specified object is equivalent to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor do objeto especificado é equivalente ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects are equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> forem equivalentes, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Only other objects of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> (or a derived type) can be equal to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.
trans-unit.target: Somente outros objetos do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> (ou um tipo derivado) pode ser igual à atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> properties for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objects must be the same.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> propriedades para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objetos devem ser iguais.

trans-unit.source: Generates a hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera um código hash para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash do inteiro assinado de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.GetHashCode%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> values to generate a 32-bit hash code that represents the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.GetHashCode%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> valores para gerar um código hash de 32 bits que representa o atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code is a number that corresponds to the value of an object (so two objects that have the same value should generate the same hash code).
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash é um número que corresponde ao valor de um objeto (para que os dois objetos que têm o mesmo valor devem gerar o mesmo código de hash).

trans-unit.source: Hash codes are used to sort and store collections of objects.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de hash são usados para classificar e armazenar coleções de objetos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable?displayProperty=nameWithType> represents a collection of key-and-value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable?displayProperty=nameWithType> representa uma coleção de pares de chave e valor que são organizados com base no código hash da chave.

trans-unit.source: For more information on hash codes and hash functions, see the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre códigos de hash e funções de hash, consulte o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the combined padding for the right and left edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o preenchimento combinado para as bordas direita e esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sum, in pixels, of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right" /> padding values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a soma, em pixels, ou o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right" /> valores de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: This property is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é conveniente para uso em muitos cálculos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para a borda esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento em pixels, da borda esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode alterar esse valor de configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Performs vector addition on the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects, resulting in a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa a adição de vetor nos dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados, resultando em um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that results from adding <paramref name="p1" /> and <paramref name="p2" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que resulta da adição de <paramref name="p1" /> e <paramref name="p2" />.

trans-unit.source: A vector addition operation is the result of adding the padding values for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de adição de vetor é o resultado da adição dos valores de preenchimento para cada borda.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> property of the result is the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> properties of the two operands.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> propriedade do resultado é a soma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> propriedades dos dois operandos.

trans-unit.source: This operation is transitive.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação é transitiva.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.Padding%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.Padding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.Padding%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.Padding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a testar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a testar.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objects are equal if the padding values for each of the four edges – <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> – are the same for both objects.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objetos são iguais se o preenchimento valores para cada uma das quatro bordas – <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> – são as mesmas para os dois objetos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a testar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a testar.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados não são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> forem diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operation is the inverse of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação é o inverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.op_Equality%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é a negação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to subtract from (the minuend).
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> do qual um valor será subtraído (o minuendo).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> to subtract from (the subtrahend).
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> a subtrair de (o subtraendo).

trans-unit.source: Performs vector subtraction on the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> objects, resulting in a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa a subtração de vetor nos dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificados, resultando em um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> result of subtracting <paramref name="p2" /> from <paramref name="p1" />.
trans-unit.target: O resultado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> da subtração de <paramref name="p2" /> de <paramref name="p1" />.

trans-unit.source: A vector subtraction operation is the result of subtracting the padding values for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de subtração de vetor é o resultado da subtração de valores de preenchimento para cada borda.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> property of the result is the difference between the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> properties of two operands.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> propriedade do resultado é a diferença entre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> propriedades dos dois operandos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Subtract%28System.Windows.Forms.Padding%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.Padding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Subtract%28System.Windows.Forms.Padding%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.Padding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para a borda direita.

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento em pixels, da borda direita.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode alterar esse valor de configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding information in the form of a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de preenchimento na forma de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> containing the padding information.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as informações de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> property performs a type conversion from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> to <xref:System.Drawing.Size?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> propriedade executa uma conversão de tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> para <xref:System.Drawing.Size?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A> property corresponds to the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A> property corresponds to the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A> propriedade corresponde ao <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A> propriedade corresponde do <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> é conveniente para uso em muitos cálculos de layout.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value from another.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificado de outro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that contains the result of the subtraction of one specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value from another.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que contém o resultado da subtração de um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> especificado de outro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para a borda superior.

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento em pixels, da borda superior.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode alterar esse valor de configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string containing the labeled values of the padding for all four edges.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém os valores de rotulado de preenchimento para todas as quatro bordas.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the combined padding for the top and bottom edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o preenchimento combinado das margens superior e inferior.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sum, in pixels, of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom" /> padding values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a soma, em pixels, ou o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom" /> valores de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: This property is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é conveniente para uso em muitos cálculos de layout.
